title: Button Tutorial - Complete Example
description: Step-by-step button creation with hover effects and modern styling
css: .dsl-button:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.4); transition: all 0.3s ease; } .dsl-button:active { transform: translateY(-1px); box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.3); } .dsl-button:focus { outline: none; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.3), 0 0 0 3px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.2); }
